snippet: Britain agreed on Sunday to arrange 10 billion pounds in loans to finance infrastructure projects in Iraq over a 10 year period, a program that would only benefit British companies, an Iraqi minister said in Baghdad....

headline.main: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match
headline.print_headline: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match

lead_paragraph: Britain agreed on Sunday to arrange 10 billion pounds in loans to finance infrastructure projects in Iraq over a 10 year period, a program that would only benefit British companies, an Iraqi minister said in Baghdad.
